data.actual_result: The text goes onto a newline once reaching the end of the visible text field area
data.expected_result: The text should continue on one line
data.short_description: Text in Search & Quick Switcher text fields go onto newlines when reaching past the visible text field area
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Search in a DM or server - Type enough characters into the field so that it expands past the visible text field area and observe
